activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12440
activity.text:
Hi! I’d like to take this up.

Just confirmed the issue — when clicking “View Notes,” the cursor starts at the beginning instead of the end of the text. Expected behavior is for it to jump to the end.

Please assign this to me. Thanks! 😊

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12429
activity.text: 🐛 Fix: Prevent crash when adding a row after deleting all rows in Header (#12428)

open_prs.title: Fixes cursor auto-positioning at end in Notes Textarea
